channel.title: Comments on: Links for Mon 2 Jun 2008

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.content:encoded:
@Deane –

Not sure if it’s worth having the whole site be a shell, but I think having shell that is one component of a site could very useful.

I remember those green screen days. That was when having a color monitor meant it was amber instead of green.

item.title: By: Deane
item.dc:creator: Deane
item.description: I've long-maintained that there's a place for a shell-like environment for oft-used Web sites. I used to work in a green-screen 15 years ago, and the speed people could operate it is flat impossible with a GUI.
item.content:encoded: I’ve long-maintained that there’s a place for a shell-like environment for oft-used Web sites. I used to work in a green-screen 15 years ago, and the speed people could operate it is flat impossible with a GUI.
